EmailTemplate.name: Mass Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Hello {!Contact.FirstName}. Do you still need cash for your business?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
Did you know your credit card machine may get you up to $600,000 in unsecured working capital in as few as 10 days!
SMART No Personal Guarantees* No Liens or Collateral No Fixed Payment Schedule No Business Use Restrictions No Application Fees FAST Apply in less than 3 minutes Cash wired to you in 7-10 days EASY No complicated paperwork
*Individuals only liable in cases of fraud, misrepresentation, and as further detailed in contract.
Call or email us today, and see how much {!Lead.Company} qualifies for!
{!Lead.OwnerFullName}
{!Lead.OwnerPhone} or {!Lead.OwnerEmail}
